de.fhws.hablame.service.api

Interface IHablameClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HablameClient

    public interface IHablameClient
    This interface defines the contract, each client needs to full fill, if it wants to speak with the Hablame Botbackend.
    Author:
    Kristoffer Schneider kschneider@codingfalx.de

    • Method Detail

      • getReplyForMessageAsync

        java.util.concurrent.Future<com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String>> getReplyForMessageAsync(java.lang.String message)
        Requests the answer for the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - message to send to the service
        Returns:
        Future to the service' response

      • getReplyForMessageAsync

        void getReplyForMessageAsync(java.lang.String message,
                             java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> callback)
        Requests the answer for the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - message to send to the service
        callback - callback to call when a service response is available. First param is the Http-status code, second the response text

      • stopConversationAndBot

        java.util.concurrent.Future<com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String>> stopConversationAndBot()
        Requests to stop the conversation and the running bot.
        Returns:
        informations about stopping the conversation and bot

      • stopConversationAndBot

        void stopConversationAndBot(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> callback)
        Requests to stop the conversation and the running bot.
        Parameters:
        callback - is called when the service response is available. First param is the Http-Status from the service backend. Seconds parameter is the response text.
